column1: EmergencyConfirmationNumberConditionsFor utility excavation questions please call inspector(Woojoo Chung) at (415-554-6420)==>>(1:51pm==12-16-2015)24 Hour / 7 Day Contact:7072924957Service Address/Project:Richmond Underground Bore at Funston and AnzaConstruction Start DateStart Date01/04/2016Permit expires on:01/15/2016PurposeTelephoneType of facility:Excavation ReasonInstall New ServiceExcavation Reason DescriptionMethod:Trenchless: Dir BoringTrackingNumber1TrackingNumber2Project Size156Inspection

SONIC - 15EXC–7628  - Anza St. and Funston St. – Moratorium –– [Install New Service] - Service Requested on 12-10-2015 ==>>>Permittee must contact DPW-BSM – Inspector (Woojoo Chung) at (415-554-6420) at least 3 business days prior to commencement ofwork to schedule a pre-construction meeting, or permit is not valid.  ====>>====>>PERMIT IS ISSUED UNDER THE CONDITION THAT: SONIC with Permit 15EXC–7628 will coordinate the final paving (mill and fill)for work at Anza St. and Funston St. _Moratorium End Date: 07-23-2018 ==============>>>>>>>>All excavations in streetsshall be restored with a "T-Section" along with all other requirements including the agreed upon signed Moratorium waiver (attached). A"T-Section" requires the removal and replacement of both the concrete base and asphalt-wearing surface for an additional one (1) footbeyond the excavated trench.  ===========>>>2. –If concrete gutter or parking strip is excavated, SONIC shall remove and replace the entire concrete section from construction joint toconstruction joint. (No new construction joint will be allowed). ====>>=================>Anza St.–THE MINIMUM FINAL PAVING (mill and fill) FOR THE EXCAVATION SHALL INCLUDE THE RESTORATION OF THE FULL WIDTHOF ALL AFFECTED LANES from P/L at intersection with Funston St. to the nearest P/L along Anza St. –and should show one continuousrectangle pavement section ======>> All street restorations shall be to the satisfaction of the City and County of San Francisco DPW -BSM. For questions please call inspector (Woojoo Chung) at (415-554-6420) 72 Hrs. prior (mill & fill) and after the restoration of Anza St.===>>> (12-28-2015) ==(11:54 am===12-28-2015)
